name: heterogeneous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of parts or things that are very different from each other: Switzerland is a heterogeneous confederation of 26 self-governing cantons. Compare
homogeneous

differentdifferentI like her haircut - it's different! dissimilarThe twins may look alike, but they are quite dissimilar when it comes to personality.diverseLondon is a culturally diverse city.heterogeneousThey tested a heterogeneous population.

heterogeneity

Add to word list
consisting of different parts or types: With many ethnic groups represented, the student body is very heterogeneous.
